member.name: T:WebApi.Startup
member.summary: Startup class of the WebApi project

member.name: M:WebApi.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to add services to the container.
member.param: Services to add to the collection

member.name: M:WebApi.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostEnvironment)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to configure the HTTP request pipeline.
member.param: Provides the mechanism to configure application request pipeline
